parameters.name: Bizdate
parameters.description: The data timestamp. The value of this parameter is 00:00:00 of the day before the scheduling time of the instance. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds. Example: 1743350400000.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the instance. The instance may be rerun. If the instance is rerun and you configure this parameter, the system returns the historical information of the instance, including the rerun information. You can use the RunNumber parameter to distinguish each entry in the historical information.

parameters.name: Ids
parameters.description: The IDs of the instances. You can query multiple instances at a time by instance ID.

parameters.name: Owner
parameters.description: The account ID of the task owner.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: ProjectEnv
parameters.description:
The environment of the workspace. Valid values:

*   Prod: production environment
*   Dev: development environment

parameters.name: ProjectId
parameters.description: The DataWorks workspace ID.

parameters.name: RuntimeResource
parameters.description: The information about the resource group. Set this parameter to the identifier of a resource group for scheduling.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description:
The field used for sorting. Fields such as TriggerTime and StartedTime are supported. The value of this parameter is in the Sort field + Sort by (Desc/Asc) format. By default, results are sorted in ascending order. Valid values:

*   `TriggerTime (Desc/Asc)`

*   `StartedTime (Desc/Asc)`

*   `FinishedTime (Desc/Asc)`

*   `CreateTime (Desc/Asc)`

*   `Id (Desc/Asc)`

    Default value: `Id Desc`.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the task instance.

*   `NotRun`: Not started
*   `Running`
*   `Failure`
*   `Success`
*   `WaitTime`: Awaiting scheduled time
*   `WaitResource`: Awaiting resources

parameters.name: TaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the task for which the instance is generated.

parameters.name: TaskIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the tasks. You can query multiple instances at a time by task ID.

parameters.name: TaskName
parameters.description: The name of the task. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: TaskType
parameters.description: The type of the task for which the instance is generated.

parameters.name: TriggerRecurrence
parameters.description:
The running mode of the instance after it is triggered. This parameter takes effect only if the TriggerType parameter is set to Scheduler. Valid values:

*   Pause
*   Skip
*   Normal

parameters.name: TriggerType
parameters.description:
The trigger type. Valid values:

*   Scheduler: scheduling cycle-based trigger
*   Manual: manual trigger

parameters.name: WorkflowId
parameters.description: The ID of the workflow to which the instance belongs.

parameters.name: WorkflowInstanceId
parameters.description: The workflow instance ID.

parameters.name: WorkflowInstanceType
parameters.description:
The type of the workflow instance. Valid values:

*   SmokeTest: Testing
*   Manual: Manually triggered node
*   SupplementData: Data backfill
*   ManualWorkflow: Manually triggered workflow
*   Normal: Scheduled execution
*   TriggerWorkflow: Triggered Workflow
